Name: require_product_owner_assigned
Description: Each project must have a Product Owner

Name: require_scrum_master_per_team
Description: Each team must have exactly one Scrum Master

Name: enforce_sprint_duration
Description: Sprint duration must be between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: limit_work_in_progress
Description: Maximum 3 tasks per worker in 'In Progress' state

Name: enforce_backlog_ordering
Description: Product Backlog entries must be prioritized

Name: require_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: All user stories must have acceptance criteria

Name: ensure_task_belongs_to_story
Description: Every task must belong to a user story

Name: prevent_duplicate_emails
Description: No two workers can have the same email

Name: enforce_skill_level_range
Description: Skill level must be between 1 and 5

Name: require_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Sprint must have a defined goal

Name: limit_epic_size
Description: An epic should not exceed 20 story points

Name: mandate_daily_scrum_frequency
Description: Daily Scrum must occur every weekday during sprint

Name: require_development_snapshot
Description: Sprint must generate a development snapshot

Name: enforce_unique_feature_title
Description: Feature titles must be unique across product

Name: require_stakeholder_feedback
Description: At least 2 stakeholders must attend each Sprint Review
